channel.title: Death animation
channel.description:
yer.. the emote you do when u die? i wanna change that..
uhm... idk where to find the place to change it at, i got the animation i want to change it too: 837
1 problem.. CANT FIND THE PLACE TO DO IT AT
plz help? lolz ---------new question how do you deley how fast you tele after you die

ok did it ( thanks for makein it even more noob freindly ) and i compiled no errors,
for some odd reason… i have more then one thing of “oh dear you are dead”

do i do

[code]teleportToX = 3254;
teleportToY = 3420;
//pEmote = 15;
//pWalk = 13;
sendMessage(“Oh dear you are dead!”);
startAnimation(837);
DeathSeconds = 4;
setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
currentHealth = 99;
hitDiff = 0;
updateRequired = true;

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;[/code]

on all?

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;[/code]

using Ctrl + F

then press the down arrow

and if that line looks like this

then add this there public int DeathSeconds = -1;

item.title: Death animation
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

you add public int DeathSeconds = -1;

under this line public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

so its like this in client.java

[code]
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public int DeathSeconds = -1;[/code]

and it resets animation after 2 seconds not 4 because it makes it go down by one each ½ second

Read full topic

item.title: Death animation
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

just downloaded pimpscape and i did this

sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); startAnimation(837); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0;

NOTICE: i added the startAnimation(837); that is to start that emote

now this would just make the character just lay down right? so let’s another one

DeathSeconds = 4;

now it should look like this

teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); startAnimation(837); DeathSeconds = 4; setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

but wait now we must add it as int!

so lets add public int DeathSeconds = -1; under public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

but it’s still not working lets add this in boolean process() {

[code]if(DeathSeconds > 0)
DeathSeconds–;

if(DeathSeconds == 0) {
frame1(); //resets animation
DeathSeconds = -1;
}[/code]

and ther your done… i even tested it self and it worked :Done at 02:20 in the morning (haven’t sleeped yet from 09:00 yesterday lol)

Read full topic
